sentences.pinyin: gōngsī huì bǔcháng nǐ de sǔnshī.
sentences.translation: The company will compensate for your loss.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于火灾原因，保险公司承诺补偿商家所有的损失。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於火災原因，保險公司承諾補償商家所有的損失。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú huǒzāi yuányīn, bǎoxiǎn gōngsī chéngnuò bǔcháng shāngjiā suǒyǒu de sǔnshī.
sentences.translation: Due to the fire, the insurance company promised to compensate the merchants for all their losses.
